about_the_game:
In "Crossing Miracles," you will enter a world where safety is a luxury and zombies lurk around every corner. Developed by creators from northwest China, this game authentically recreates rural architectural environments, giving you a genuine countryside experience.

Game Features:

Thrilling Shooting Experience: Search for weapons within limited time, eliminate zombies, and test your reflexes and combat strategy.
Unique Tricycle Vehicle: Drive a tricycle through a world overrun by zombies, adding endless fun to your adventure.
Authentic Rural Environment: The game realistically reproduces the architectural environment of northwest China’s rural areas, offering an authentic countryside feel.
Diverse Enemies: Face various types of zombies and experience different surprises and dangers.
Stunning 3D Graphics: Enjoy high-quality visuals and smooth gameplay, making you feel like you’re truly immersed.
Are you ready to face the challenge? "Crossing Miracles" will provide you with an unparalleled survival experience. Brave the zombie-infested world and save a desolate countryside!

short_description: "Crossing Miracles" is a 3D shooter from northwest China, set in a zombie-ravaged post-apocalyptic world. Drive a unique tricycle through a detailed rural setting and battle relentless zombies in a thrilling survival adventure.
